title.rendered: It is easy to help your parents find a reliable maid in India.

content.rendered:
While you are living abroad, how do you ensure your parents are living comfortably back home?

Finding a house help for them has always been challenging for you.

Try Helpers Near Me and help them find a reliable maid in India.

HELPERS NEAR ME (HNM) helps you find & hire legally verified workers near you. The platform uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions. On the other end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to spread the platform’s accessibility to as many workers all over India as possible. 

Working in a big multinational company and staying abroad is considered as the most stable and progressive life for millions of Indian youngsters today.

Majority of us, who graduate from a good engineering or management colleges aspire to get a well-paying job in an MNC. And the very next aspiration is getting a project abroad.

An on-site project means an excellent opportunity to work in advanced markets and a significant rise in one’s pay package, in comparison to what one gets in the home country.

For most of us who goes abroad once, tries to stay there for as long as possible.

Some of us also apply for green cards & permanent citizenship.

The situation there:

For people looking from the outside, staying abroad might seem to be an ideal situation to be in – there are money, respect, glamour, comfort and the perks of the foreign country.

But if one has a closer look, it is way more difficult than one thinks. Many of us who stay abroad for a longer duration get lesser chances to come back and stay with our families, especially our parents.

Even if we come home, the vacations are too short and most of the days go in attending some social or family functions.

Towards the end of it, there’s always a bit of guilt:

  • The guilt of leaving behind the parents alone
  • The feeling of neglecting our duties
  • Fear of the long distance and not being there when needed

The situation here:

Back here in India, our parents feel proud and happy that their children are achieving great success in their lives.

They feel great that we call them abroad to stay comfortably with us.

However, they never think of permanently leaving their home country and settling down in foreign lands with us. And why should they feel like that?

Their roots and the entire social circle is in India. And in this old age, they are comfortable with staying around their hometown, among families, friends, and relatives of their age.

Of course, they miss us but do not grudge us for that. After all, they had also left their towns and villages at some point in their lives to make a living.

This is a practical situation of today’s age, and numerous families have made their peace with it.

The Problem:

Our parents face physical exertion as they grow old. Mother is no longer capable of doing the same household chores she did 10 years ago. And we don’t even wish for such situations where she keeps doing what she used to when we were kids.

When you come to think of it, there are hundreds of small household tasks that need extra helping hands, almost every day:

  •  Cleaning of house
  • Chopping vegetables, plucking the methi/palak/dhaniya, etc. and Cooking food, however basic the need may be
  • Arranging the wardrobe
  • Putting the clothes to dry
  • Folding and arranging the dried clothes
  • Getting the vegetables, groceries & fruits from the market

All these tasks put together becomes too overwhelming for someone who is not young enough.

At this age, all that our parents want to do is:

  • Go to their friend’s place and talk for a few hours,
  • Attend some Bhajan & Kirtan Class
  • Meet with relatives
  • Or simply lie down and read

It’s a huge luxury for the mother if someone could take care of all the mundane daily chores. A Maid comes as a massive relief in such a case. Similarly, for the father, it’s a great help if he has a Maid or a Helper who can help him clean his bookshelf, dust his writing table or randomly water his plants. Even if he enjoys doing these tasks, it’s an excellent support to have an extra help when he has to attend to some other important stuff.

So what do we do then? How do we ensure we take care of their daily needs?

What do we do to ensure that there’s someone to attend them every day?

While sitting there in some far away country, is there anything that we could do to help our parents back home?

And if it helps, how do we find a reliable Maid for their home in India from such a remote location?

The Solution: Meet Helpers Near Me.

It helps you to find a Maid for the home in India in the easiest possible way.

Helpers Near Me lets you find a reliable Maid near your search location in just 5 minutes.

Even the charges are nominal – starting at Rs.99/- only.

Furthermore, it connects you with multiple Maids, not just one of them.

Having this kind of choice ensures that you get the best Maid who meets all your requirements and also fits your budget.

Here are some of the compelling reasons why you should try Helpers Near Me when you need a Maid for the home in India:

  • It is convenient – At Helpers Near Me, you can find Maids at your convenience. It is Easier, Simpler & Better. 5 minutes and just a click of a few buttons, that’s all it takes to find a Maid on this App
  • Verified Maids – Helpers Near Me verifies every Maid thoroughly. The platform follows a 2/3 Step Verification Process for every Maid. First, their IDs are verified, and second, their Criminal Court Records are checked across thousands of District Courts of India. At an additional nominal fee of Rs.199/-, you can even get this detailed Background Verification report emailed to yourself
  • Maids from nearby – The App is designed in such a way that it allows you to find Maids in the vicinity of your home in India
  • Offers choices of Maids, even though you need just one – Helpers Near Me connects you with multiple Maids in every order, and not only one of them. It offers choices so that you get to choose the best one among all the available options
  • Find Maids from a vast pool of database – Helpers Near Me has thousands of Maids associated with its platform. So, when you make an order, you get the best of the choices available from within your locality
  • Nominal Charges – You get to find multiple Maids in just Rs.500/-. And once you hire one Maid or two from the available options, you don’t need to pay anything further. Rs.500/- is all it takes.
  • No Agents / Contractors in between – At Helpers Near Me, you get to contact Maids directly. There’s no middle-men in between.

Now, imagine all this, while sitting far away from your hometown.

So, when you need to find a Maid for the home in India, just try Helpers Near Me. By far, Helpers Near Me is the easiest and the most reliable way you can find a Maid near your search locality.

Additionally, Helpers Near Me lets you connect with over 100 different profiles of Workers who work at Homes & Small Businesses. It is the easiest way you can find many other Helpers that you may need – like Cooks, Babysitters, Drivers, Office Boys, Delivery Boys, Waiters, Store Helpers, Peons, Assistants, and many more such Helpers.

On one end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. On the other, the digital infrastructure built around HNM makes it easy, quick, reliable & affordable for anyone to find & hire 100+ profiles of nearby workers.

With a vision to end poverty, forced labour, worker exploitation, and human trafficking, HNM is working towards building an unbiased and inclusive digital ecosystem where the underprivileged workforce of India can join the platform easily and access local employment free of cost, with or without smartphones.

HNM believes having enough local employment opportunities allows the workers to find a better working environment, better salaries and a chance to improve their and their families’ quality of life.

From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to make the platform accessible to as many workers in India as possible.
